casebody.data:
Alessandra L. MCKENZIE
v.
Steven M. MCKENZIE No. 262P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Steven M. McKenzie, for McKenzie, Steven M. Regina R. Gillespie, Attorney at Law, Dobson, James R. DeMay, Attorney at Law, Concord, Alessandra L. McKenzie, for McKenzie, Alessandra L.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of August 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
